headline: NetApp (NasdaqGS:NTAP) Sees 18% Price Dip After $1.64B Revenue Report
summary: NetApp (NasdaqGS:NTAP) experienced an 18% drop in share price over the past month, amid the release of its third-quarter financial results and revised corporate guidance. The company announced quarterly revenues of $1.64 billion—modestly higher than the previous year—but saw a decrease in net income to $299 million from $313 million. Meanwhile, executive changes and new product launches aimed at enhancing operational efficiency might not have delivered immediate confidence to investors. The...

headline: Flexera Completes Acquisition of NetApp's Spot FinOps Portfolio
summary: With this acquisition, Flexera now has the most comprehensive FinOps offering in marketITASCA, Ill. and SAN JOSE, Calif., March 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Flexera, the global leader in technology spend and risk management, today announced it has completed the acquisition of Spot from NetApp (NASDAQ: NTAP), the intelligent data infrastructure company.
